Text:
Thanks. (if the torrent is still alive after 9 months.)

For those who don't know, Nella got breast enhancement surgery, not much, just one size to C. This was done back in 2009, probably in the spring or early summer, if memory serves.

She wasn't butchered, as happens all too often, but I think she shouldn't have changed a thing.

But then, it's her body and hers to do with as she pleases. At least she has had the good taste to not get any tattoos. I hate those things, no matter how "tastefully done" or "exquisite".
